name: Grabby Crabby
description:
Nice guy Gus is trying to clean up the beaches using his metal detector! Mad crabs don't like humans to take their loot and will steal from him if he gets to close.

Press E to dig up loot
Press Q to toggle metal detector

3 Beeps: You are close dig
2 Beeps: You are near
1 Beeps: You are sorta warm
